author: Jonathan Ingraham jonathan.ingraham@denvergazette.com
title: Colorado Springs weather: New Year's Day sun all around
text:
We are looking at a gorgeous day to start 2024 across southern Colorado and around Colorado Springs.
"Today's nice weather will include mostly sunny skies, light winds and mild temperatures," Gazette media partner Alan Rose with KOAA said. "Afternoon highs will top out in the 30s and 40s in the mountains and mountain valleys, with 40s and lower 50s for the Plains."
Around Colorado Springs the high today will be around 51 degrees with clouds increasing this evening as part of a weaker storm moving south of Colorado on Tuesday.
Looking ahead:
"A weak storm moving to our south on Tuesday will bring us a cooler and cloudier day, with our high back down to the mid 40s," Rose said. "After a few degrees of warming on Wednesday, our late week forecast is now trending colder and snowier this morning."
Rose said a storm system currently located more than 2,000 miles west of Colorado will move towards the southern Rockies late this week. Snow will be possible from Thursday afternoon into early Friday morning here in the Pikes Peak Region. Temperatures on Thursday will warm to near 40 degrees, with 30s on Friday.
Here is the full forecast from the
National Weather Service:
Tuesday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 46. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south southeast in the morning.
Wednesday: Sunny, with a high near 48. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming southeast in the morning.
Thursday: A 20% chance of snow showers after 11 a.m. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming east in the morning.
Friday: Partly sunny, with a high near 39. North wind around 15 mph.

author: Agency Report
title: Nigeria, South Africa Sign Pact On Mining Development
text:
In a bid to solidify the partnership fostered through the Nigeria–South Africa Bi-National Commission—recently inaugurated by President Bola Ahmed Tinubu and President Cyril Ramaphosa—the Ministers of Solid Minerals of both nations have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) outlining key areas of cooperation, complete with implementation timelines.
During a bilateral meeting at his office in Abuja, the Minister of Solid Minerals Development, Dr. Dele Alake, hosted South Africa’s Minister of Mineral Resources and Energy, H.E. Gwede Mantashe. Dr. Alake described the engagement as a milestone in deepening bilateral relations, especially in the vital mining sector.
Reflecting on the historical ties between the two countries, Alake noted the longstanding diplomatic and economic cooperation built on mutual respect and a shared vision for Africa’s development. He stressed that collaboration in the mining sector offers vast opportunities for industrialization, job creation, and sustainable growth across the continent.
“The Memorandum of Understanding in geology, mining, and mineral processing signed today,” Alake stated, “will serve as a cornerstone for facilitating knowledge and technology transfer, investment promotion, capacity building, regional integration, and value addition.”
Key Highlights of the MoU Include:
Capacity building in geological applications using Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) Utilization of Multi- and Hyper-spectral Remote Sensing Technologies for mineral exploration and geological mapping Sharing of geoscientific data on strategic minerals through the Nigeria Geological Survey Agency (NGSA) Training on mineral processing and value addition Capacity Building on Elemental Fingerprint Technology using LA-ICP-MS Exploration of Agro and Energy Minerals In Nigeria Alake emphasized Nigeria’s renewed focus on developing its mining industry, stating that South Africa could benefit from Nigeria’s vast mineral wealth, while Nigeria could tap into South Africa’s advanced mining expertise. This synergy, he said, would open doors to investment, skills development, and economic diversification.
In his remarks, H.E. Gwede Mantashe affirmed that South Africa—where mining plays a central role in the economy—stands to gain from Nigeria’s revitalized interest in the sector. He added that his visit aimed to fine-tune agreements from the Bi-National Commission and to deepen collaboration on mutually beneficial projects with Nigeria’s Ministry of Solid Minerals Development.
Both ministers committed to sustained engagement and collaboration to boost intra-African trade and deliver on the actionable steps outlined in the MoU. They expressed confidence that this renewed partnership would significantly enhance the mining sectors of both countries.
The MoU signing was attended by the Minister of Steel Development, Shuaibu Audu; Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of Solid Minerals Development, Dr. Mary Ogbe; Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of Steel Development, Dr. Chris Isokpunwu; alongside senior officials from both solid minerals and steel development ministries and members of the South African delegation led by H.E. Gwede Mantashe.

author: Giovanna Peterlevitz
title: O Instagram caiu? Usuários relatam problemas ao acessar aplicativo
text: O Instagram está apresentando instabilidade na tarde desta quinta-feira (14), com diversos usuários relatando dificuldades para acessar o aplicativo. De acordo com o Downdetector, plataforma onde problemas de funcionamento em sites e aplicativos podem ser reportados, o pico de reclamações ocorreu às 17h07. As principais dificuldades registradas foram no uso do aplicativo móvel (65% das reclamações), no login (19%) e na conexão com o servidor (16%). No total, o Downdetector recebeu 84 notificações sobre o Instagram. O mapa de reclamações mostra queixas de várias cidades do Brasil, incluindo São Paulo, Curitiba, Porto Alegre e Brasília. Usuários também usaram redes sociais, como o X, para questionar se o “Instagram caiu”. Muitos relataram que, ao tentar acessar perfis pelo navegador, aparece a mensagem “Ocorreu um problema e não foi possível carregar a página”. Até o momento, a Meta, empresa responsável pelo Instagram, ainda não se pronunciou sobre a causa da instabilidade. Quer ficar ligado em tudo o que rola em Campinas? author: @crowdnewswire
title: Residential Heat Pump Market to Reach USD 67.5 Billion With CAGR of 9.28% by 2032
text:
Residential Heat Pump Market A Comprehensive Overview
The residential heat pump market is gaining significant momentum due to the increasing demand for energy-efficient and environmentally friendly solutions in homes. As energy costs rise and environmental concerns grow, homeowners are turning to heat pumps as a reliable alternative to traditional heating and cooling systems. In this detailed guide, we will explore the trends, growth factors, types, and benefits of residential heat pumps that are shaping the market today.
Request Free Sample Report:
https://www.marketresearchfuture.com/sample_request/28936
What is a Residential Heat Pump?
A residential heat pump is a system that transfers heat from one location to another, either heating or cooling a home depending on the season. The technology utilizes electricity to move heat, making it more energy-efficient than traditional furnaces and air conditioners . By leveraging natural heat in the air, water, or ground, heat pumps can reduce energy consumption and lower utility bills.
Types of Residential Heat Pumps
Air Source Heat Pumps (ASHPs) Air source heat pumps are the most common type in residential applications. They work by extracting heat from the air outside the home and transferring it inside during the winter, or doing the reverse in the summer to cool the home. ASHPs are popular due to their relatively low installation cost and efficiency in moderate climates.
Ground Source Heat Pumps (GSHPs) Ground source heat pumps, also known as geothermal heat pumps , extract heat from the ground. These systems are more efficient than air source heat pumps because the temperature below the earth’s surface remains more constant than the air above. However, they come with higher installation costs due to the need for underground pipes, but the long-term savings often justify the initial investment.
Water Source Heat Pumps (WSHPs) Water source heat pumps use bodies of water like lakes, ponds, or wells as a heat exchange source. These systems are highly efficient in areas where a water source is readily available, but they are less common due to the geographical requirements for installation.
Hybrid Heat Pumps Hybrid heat pumps combine two different heat sources, such as air and ground or air and a traditional furnace. These systems automatically switch between the heat sources depending on the efficiency at a given temperature, maximizing energy savings and performance.
Buy Now:
https://www.marketresearchfuture.com/checkout?currency=one_user-USD&report_id=28936
Key Drivers of the Residential Heat Pump Market
Increasing Energy Efficiency Standards As governments around the world tighten energy efficiency standards , residential heat pumps have emerged as a key solution. Heat pumps are capable of delivering up to three times more energy than they consume, making them an ideal choice for reducing carbon footprints and complying with new regulations.
Rising Energy Costs The cost of electricity, gas, and oil has been steadily increasing over the years. Homeowners are seeking alternatives that lower their heating and cooling costs. Residential heat pumps, especially those powered by renewable energy sources like solar, can significantly reduce monthly utility expenses.
Government Incentives and Rebates Governments across the globe are providing tax credits , rebates , and subsidies to encourage homeowners to switch to heat pumps. For example, in the United States, the federal government offers tax incentives under the Energy Star program for homes that install energy-efficient heat pumps.
Focus on Sustainability and Environmental Impact With global efforts to combat climate change , there is an increasing shift toward eco-friendly technology in residential settings. Heat pumps, which rely on renewable sources for energy, produce fewer greenhouse gases compared to conventional HVAC systems, thus playing a crucial role in reducing environmental impact.
Technological Advancements Recent innovations in heat pump technology have made these systems more reliable and versatile. Inverter-driven compressors , variable refrigerant flow (VRF), and smart thermostats have greatly enhanced the efficiency, lifespan, and user control of modern heat pumps.
Browse Full Report:
https://www.marketresearchfuture.com/reports/residential-heat-pump-market-28936
Challenges in the Residential Heat Pump Market
High Initial Cost One of the main barriers to the widespread adoption of residential heat pumps is the high upfront installation cost, especially for ground source and hybrid systems. Although the long-term savings on energy bills can offset this cost, many homeowners hesitate to invest initially.
Climate Limitations Air source heat pumps can lose efficiency in extreme cold conditions, making them less effective in regions with harsh winters. Although newer models with cold climate capabilities have been developed, this remains a limitation for certain areas.
Space Constraints Ground source heat pumps require substantial space for the installation of underground pipes. This can be a significant limitation for homeowners in urban or densely populated areas where space is at a premium.
Residential Heat Pump Market Trends
Growth in Smart Home Integration The rise of smart homes is directly influencing the residential heat pump market. Many homeowners are now opting for smart heat pumps that can be controlled via mobile apps or integrated with home automation systems. These smart solutions enable homeowners to optimize energy use, monitor performance, and even detect maintenance issues before they become costly repairs.
Expansion in Renewable Energy Integration As renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power become more accessible, there is a growing trend toward integrating heat pumps with solar photovoltaic (PV) systems. Homeowners can now use the electricity generated by their solar panels to power their heat pumps, further reducing energy costs and improving sustainability.
Increased Focus on Cold Climate Heat Pumps Manufacturers are increasingly focused on developing heat pumps that perform well in cold climates. New cold climate heat pumps (CCHPs) are designed to operate efficiently even in temperatures as low as -25°C, expanding the market potential for heat pumps in colder regions.
Rising Demand in Urban Areas Urbanization is driving demand for compact and energy-efficient heating solutions . As cities grow and housing becomes denser, heat pump technology is evolving to meet the needs of urban homeowners with limited space. Compact, wall-mounted units and multi-zone systems are becoming popular in city settings.
Future Outlook of the Residential Heat Pump Market
The residential heat pump market is poised for significant growth in the coming years. With governments pushing for energy-efficient homes, technological innovations continuing to improve system performance, and a growing focus on sustainability, the demand for residential heat pumps is expected to soar. In addition to continued growth in traditional markets, emerging regions such as Asia-Pacific and Latin America are projected to be key areas of expansion due to rising energy costs and the global push for reducing carbon emissions.
Conclusion
The residential heat pump market represents one of the most promising sectors in the HVAC industry. With its potential to drastically reduce energy consumption and carbon emissions, while providing significant cost savings, heat pumps are increasingly becoming the system of choice for modern homeowners. As technological advancements continue and government incentives rise, the future of residential heat pumps looks brighter than ever.

author: Bluevy PLT
title: 【林炎葵逝世】 "三代"槟首长先后吊唁 许子根：槟州痛失慈善楷模！光华日报 | 1910年创刊 创新每一天生活
text:
生前为慈善事业不遗余力、贡献良多的社会知名企业慈善家拿督斯里林炎葵日前与世长辞，槟州“三代”首长先后到丧府吊唁，前任槟州首长丹斯里许子根说，林炎葵的离世是槟州也是社会的损失！
他周三（2日）晚前往丧府吊唁，在慰问林炎葵家属后如是向媒体指出。
他受询时说，在未担任首长前就认识林炎葵，两人结识多年。
他称赞林炎葵是一位杰出领袖，而他也被其热忱所感动。
他提及，其儿子和林炎葵女婿是同学，从幼儿园到中学，因此两家有着两三重的关系。
- Advertisement -
- Advertisement -
另外，前任槟州首长林冠英与现任槟州首长曹观友也分别在周二晚及周三下午到来丧府吊唁并慰问家属，受到林炎葵遗孀拿汀斯里陈宝珠、女婿拿督斯里陈惠仁、幼女拿汀斯里林俞宏，以及长女林秀忆接待。
光华日报董事兼董事主席特别助理拿督叶进煜、大山脚斗母宫、槟城宏冠文化体育会等人周三晚也前来拜祭吊唁。

author: Allie Martin
title: Tupelo Salvation Army offers shelter from the cold
text:
Tupelo Salvation Army offers shelter from the cold
TUPELO, MISS. (WCBI) -As the temperatures drop, it can be dangerous and potentially deadly for those without a home.
It is early afternoon at the Tupelo Salvation Army, and there are a handful of people in the gym. Whenever the temperature hits 32 degrees, the gym is open for those who want a break from the cold weather.
“We have water, bathroom facilities and then we serve meals, lunch and dinner,” said Capt. LeAnna Marion.
The Jim Ingram Red Shield Lodge has 55 beds available, and a cold weather shelter has an additional eighteen. If both of those are maxed out, the gym is available. But so far, Captain Marion says the extra beds haven’t been needed.
“You know there are those who don’t want to come , there are those who, because of the new programs we put into place, found housing, apartments, so we are really excited for those who have found more permanent housing opportunities,” Capt. Marion said.
Captain Marion points out that none of the assistance available, for those who want it, would be possible without community support. And the last Red Kettle campaign was a record breaker.
“We were able to raise over 177 thousand dollars, the previous record was 171,” she said.
And money collected during the Red Kettle campaign, funds the Salvation Army’s outreaches throughout the year.
“The Kettle program is our single biggest fundraising program for the entire year and that’s what helps to pay for all programs the Salvation Army will do for 2024,” Marion said.
Captain Marion also credits the large number of volunteers from the community, and she points out, there is always room for more.
During the recent Red Kettle campaign, sixty eight volunteers rang bells and collected money.
To volunteer at the Tupelo Salvation Army, call 662 842 9222.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Police in Texas ask public to identify people in video near where pregnant teen and her boyfriend were found dead
text:
Police in Texas ask public to identify people in video near where pregnant teen and her boyfriend were found dead
By Sara Smart and Eric Levenson, CNN
(CNN) — Police in San Antonio said Thursday they are looking for two people who were seen on surveillance video near where the bodies of a
pregnant teenager and her boyfriend were found dead earlier this week.
Savannah Soto, 18, and Matthew Guerra, 22, were reported missing last Saturday, and on Tuesday, two bodies matching their descriptions were found in a car parked near an apartment complex in San Antonio, police said. The bodies had been there for “a few days,” police said.
The medical examiner identified the male victim as Guerra, saying he died from a contact gunshot wound to the head, according to police. The pregnant female victim, who was also fatally shot, has not been officially identified, but San Antonio Police Chief William McManus said Thursday they were confident that the body belongs to Soto.
Soto was pregnant and past her delivery date when she missed an essential medical appointment and her family reported her missing, according to the
Leon Valley Police Department.
Police are investigating the killings as a capital murder case, he said.
On Thursday, police released surveillance video of two individuals driving two different cars and asked the public for help identifying them.
The video shows a dark-colored pickup truck slowing to a stop in a parking lot, and a silver Kia Optima pulling up from the other direction to stop alongside. A person then gets out of the pickup truck, walks to the Kia and interacts with the driver before returning to the truck, the video shows.
The Optima was the victims’ car and is the same vehicle in which Soto and Guerra were found. The video was taken a few days prior to the discovery of the bodies, McManus said.
It’s difficult to see in the video what the people are doing. McManus said police believe the man in the truck was doing “something to wipe the side of the car,” though he could not be certain.
“We are hoping that someone is able to identify the individuals that are seen in this video,” the chief said.
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2023 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Democratic lawmaker faces GOP challenge over voter registration
text:
Democratic lawmaker faces GOP challenge over voter registration
By Annie Grayer and Haley Talbot, CNN
(CNN) — Democratic Rep. Emilia Sykes of Ohio is battling a last-minute challenge to her eligibility to vote in her district as a result of a complaint filed by a local Republican activist.
After a county elections board deadlocked over the issue on Thursday, the decision over whether the congresswoman can cast her ballot in Akron, Ohio, where she is registered to vote, will now come down to Republican Ohio Secretary of State Frank LaRose.
Following the tied elections board vote, Sykes, who represents Ohio’s 13th District and is running for reelection, said in a statement to CNN, “These partisan games are a disservice to the voters in Ohio’s 13th Congressional district and the latest in a coordinated effort to rob them of their voice.”
The partisan challenge to her voter registration and ability to vote in her district does not challenge her eligibility to run and represent the district.
Even though the ruling on her voter registration is still up in the air, Sykes went forward with voting at her local polling place on Thursday, daring her opponents to discount her vote.
“I just voted early,” Sykes said outside the Summit County Board early voting location in a video shared with CNN.
The challenge to Sykes’ registration came from a local tea party Republican who brought the issue to the elections board. Tom Zawistowski filed a complaint that cited a financial disclosure form from Sykes’ husband, a county commissioner in a neighboring district, that listed the congresswoman as residing in his household. Based on this disclosure, Zawistowski argued Sykes should vote where her husband lives in Columbus, Ohio.
Sykes has provided the elections board a sworn affidavit, her driver’s license, her renter’s insurance policy and other documents that show she resides in Akron but did not attend the Thursday hearing in front of the Summit County elections board.
For Sykes, the issue is personal.
“Here I am, a Black woman member of Congress whose people who look like me only had the right to vote since 1965. Now someone who does not know me, who I don’t know, who could not articulate anything about me, has the right to challenge my voter registration just because he feels like it,” Sykes told CNN ahead of Thursday’s board meeting.
On Thursday, the four-person bipartisan board considering the matter evenly split along party lines, kicking the issue to the Ohio secretary of state’s office. The board has 14 days to submit the required information to LaRose who will then make a final determination, raising the question of if this will get resolved before Election Day, which is 12 days away.
The Republicans questioning Sykes’ eligibility repeatedly cited%20The%20place%20where%20the,be%20the%20spouse%27s%20place%20of) an Ohio law that states “the place where the family of a married person resides shall be considered to be the person’s place of residence.”
A spokesman for the House Republican campaign arm, Mike Marinella, said in a statement to CNN, “There are serious concerns about Emilia Sykes’ voter eligibility and she couldn’t even bother to show up to make her case.”
But Sykes’ lawyer, who was representing the congresswoman at the hearing on her behalf, argued during the proceeding that there is nothing wrong with Sykes and her husband living in different residences. The lawyer also said the statute Republicans continued to cite is based on the presumption that the place where the married person resides is also that person’s place of residence, which is not the case with Sykes and her husband.
“She says in her affidavit that she visits him sometimes in Columbus. He visits her, sometimes up here,” Don McTigue, Sykes’ lawyer, stated. “But these are two public servants who are devoting their lives to serving ,,, the citizens of their communities that they represent.”
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2024 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: Brett Davis
title: Subaru BRZ, Hyundai i30 awarded five-star ANCAP safety - PerformanceDrive
text:
Despite not actually being on sale in Australia yet, the Subaru BRZ has been tested by ANCAP in its latest round of evaluations, and has earned the full five-star rating. The BRZ joins the company’s all-five-star showroom lineup.
The Subaru BRZ comes with dual front, side, head, and knee airbags as standard, as well as stability and traction control. ANCAP said the new rear-wheel drive sports coupe “performed very well in all ANCAP tests”.
Subaru is set to launch the new sports car any time now. Prices are yet to be announced, however, the same 2.0-litre naturally aspirated boxer engine with 147kW will reside in the engine bay, as with its sister car, the Toyota 86.
The BRZ price is expected to come with a slight premium over Toyota 86 though – which starts at $29,990 – due to a potentially higher trim and equipment specification.
Other vehicles tested by ANCAP during the latest round include the new Hyundai i30, and the new Holden Colorado crew cab as reported earlier today. The ANCAP rating applies to the Hyundai i30 1.6-litre diesel and 1.8-litre petrol versions.
Lauchlan McIntosh, ANCAP chairman, recently spoke about the latest results, particularly surrounding the safety of light commercial vehicles (LCV). He said,
“It’s satisfying to see manufacturers lifting the safety of light commercial vehicles. Manufacturers have been incorporating greater levels of safety into passenger vehicles for some time now, yet the safety of LCVs has trailed,” said ANCAP Chairman, Mr Lauchlan McIntosh.
“Pressure not only from ANCAP, but now big business, is encouraging manufacturers to elevate safety as a priority in the design and construction of new LCVs, and consumers are the winners.”

author: @KWCH12
title: Northern Lights visible on horizon across Kansas
text: Northern Lights visible on horizon across Kansas WICHITA, Kan. (KWCH) - Update: The Northern Lights are again visible on the horizon across the Sunflower State with Kansans sharing views of the colorful curtain in the sky. For the second time this year, a rare G4 storm watch has been issued by the Space Weather Prediction Center. The last time it happened was in May, when most of the country witnessed the Northern Lights. A Coronal Mass Ejection, or CME, is an eruption of solar material and magnetic fields, and one is directed to hit Earth possibly late Thursday night, bringing another chance to see the Northern Lights across Kansas. The window of opportunity to potentially see the Northern Lights on Thursday night will be between 8 p.m. and 1 a.m. You’ll want to get away from the city lights and use a long exposure setting on your camera. Sky conditions Thursday night will be mainly clear, but the moon is at a first-quarter phase, which will add some light pollution to the night sky. Copyright 2024 KWCH. All rights reserved. To report a correction or typo, please email news@kwch.com
